Key Arguments: The proposed legislation will enable government censorship similar to what occurred during COVID-19.
Past suppression of information, later deemed factual, demonstrates the dangers of such powers.
The bill could suppress factual information and stifle public debate.
Censorship is historically associated with tyrannical regimes and undermines free speech.
Notable Quotes: This was in fact government censorship which stifled what is now understood to be factual information and debate on such information.
History shows us that censorship is one of the main arms of control used by tyrannical and communist countries.
